name: Don't get lit
description:
OH NO!

There's an other birthday! Try to escape to escape this party by not getting lit!

What will your highscore be?

Controls

Use D or the right arrow key to move forward;

SPACE, W or the upper arrow key to jump;

Game Jam

This game was made in about a day for the birthday jam. Happy birthday GradyIndie!

The theme was 'chaos' and the limitation 'one direction'.

You can only move forward, and the higher your score the more chaotic the game becomes.

All assets were made for this game (jam).
